name: STAY AWAY (mister241)
description:
ok so you are wondering what  is this game about
well tbh idk , but  let me tell you this 

lets imagine that you are in a cave ..  lets call it a maze , and you have something on your chest .. idk like a bomb , and there is a mad man with bomb activator device or something idk  that want to blow you up 

what will you do ??
it's easy you run for you life screaming " STAY AWAAAAAY "

don't worry there is no mad man , its just your friend sitting next to you .

Players Goals :
Player 1 goals :
you have to run for your life dodging death traps and monsters and the most dangerous of them all your good friend sitting in the couch don't think that he want to have fun playing with you he only want to blow you up 
don't worry you have Clones that are willing to die for you 
exit the maze and you will be freed

Player 2 goals :
ok listen carefully you see him , yes your friend , lets blow him up all you have to do is get in the bombs range .
how you can get to the bomb's range , i was hoping you will ask that 
i made you a radar that point to the "pray" position its not that good i made it in few days but it should do the work after all you can always look at your friend screen ;)
remember you let him out of the maze and i will .... well lets not spoil that for you

Players Controls :

Player 1 :
movement :   Arrow Keys 
creating Clones : RCtr
turning off/on the lights : RShift

Player 2 :
movement : WASD
using the radar : its automatic i told you I am the one that made it

this game was made as an entry to the Godot Wild Jam 34 .
Background Music : Kevin MacLeod - 8bit Dungeon Level ♫ NO COPYRIGHT 8-bit Music
